name: chugger
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who stands on the street and asks people who are walking past to give money to a charity: Every chugger I speak to believes in the value of what he or she is doing, and that public hostility is just part of the job.
More examplesFewer examplesThe next time you pass a chugger in the street rattling a can, feel good as you toss 50 cents into it.Next time you're accosted by a chugger, don't run away -they just want to give you a hug.Stopped by a chugger in the street, he asked her which centre she was based at.
